message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $110? It's still a great price for this amazing product!
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $105? That's the lowest I can go.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make another compromise. How about we meet at $108? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $102? That's the lowest I can go.
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $106? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm really trying to stay within my budget. How about we try $100? That's the lowest I can go.
